__e: I know you want to find your mom, but Jefferson can't help us.
Jefferson isn't a girl's name. It's not her name, either.
Jefferson's the name, and I'm a man who travels and sees much, and I know the man who can do what you want... bring back the dead.
Why don't you go back to Jefferson and tell the people there what you think you saw?
And I guess I believe in Mr Jefferson's kind, and yours, sir.
I believe it was Jefferson Davis who said...
Now, your daddy knows that what I want in return for all the help I can give him is to go down to Richmond, like he said I could as soon as Savannah fell and talk to Jefferson Davis.
You never heard word one about the wife of the Confederacy's Jefferson Davis, did you?
